plot: A family of cowboys, holding out in a hut under siege by the Sheriff's men, must face the assault of a mysterious presence during the night.
title: Braccati
plot_es: A family of cowboys, holding out in a hut under siege by the Sheriff's men, must face the assault of a mysterious presence during the night.
plot_en: A family of cowboys, holding out in a hut under siege by the Sheriff's men, must face the assault of a mysterious presence during the night.
